children.name: heading
children.description: A breif heading that shows at the top of the hero banner and describes the page. Should be 3 words or less.

children.name: description
children.description: A couple of sentences that provide more information about the heading.

children.name: button_text
children.description: The button text that describes the call to action the user should take.

children.name: button_two_text
children.description: The button text that describes the secondary call to action the user should take.

children.name: image
children.description: An image related to the group_banner.heading and group_banner.description.

children.name: content
children.description: A brief sentence which describes why the following logos are relevant to the page's content.

children.name: heading
children.description: A heading that introduces the content included in the following cards.

children.name: button_text

children.name: quote
children.description: A placeholder quote from a potential client or customer recommending the page's service or offer.

children.name: author
children.description: A name of the person giving the quote / testimonial.

children.name: author_title
children.description: A one or two word role of the testimonial author in their company.

children.name: image
children.description: An image that visually captures an element or aspect of the quote.

children.name: button_text
children.description: A brief CTA prompting the visitor to take action with the testimonial.

children.name: metric_one
children.description: A number and unit signifying an important statistic related to the focus of the page. Exclude if it a longer, non-standard unit, which would fit better in the metric_description below.

children.name: metric_description_one
children.description: A brief and concise description of the metric above. Should be no longer than 5 words.

children.name: metric_two
children.description: A number and unit signifying an important statistic related to the focus of the page. Exclude if it a longer, non-standard unit, which would fit better in the metric_description below.

children.name: metric_description_two
children.description: A brief and concise description of the metric above. Should be no longer than 5 words.

children.name: metric_three
children.description: A number and unit signifying an important statistic related to the focus of the page. Exclude if it a longer, non-standard unit, which would fit better in the metric_description below.

children.name: metric_description_three
children.description: A brief and concise description of the metric above. Should be no longer than 5 words.

children.name: heading
children.description: A brief heading that should be engaging and prepare the user for a call to action. A question works well here. Example: 'Ready to get started?'

children.name: button_text
children.description: A call to action related to the heading above.
